Regulators split on antimalarials for COVID-19 https://t.co/hfJYahFvUi
/via @TheLancet 
#US and #French authorities have authorised the use of #chloroquine and #hydroxychloroquine, but the #EU regulator and #WHO say the science doesn't support the decision.
